meanings.definition: Not sought after for romantic purposes.
meanings.sent1: She remained unwooed by all the suitors at the ball.
meanings.sent2: The unwooed princess focused on her studies rather than love.
meanings.sent3: The unwooed cat showed no interest in the fancy toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The unwooed flower bloomed beautifully, unnoticed by passersby.
meanings.sent5: The unwooed book sat untouched on the shelf, waiting for a reader.

meanings.sent1: The unwooed job offer was left unanswered by the candidate.
meanings.sent2: The unwooed opportunity to travel abroad was soon forgotten.
meanings.sent3: The unwooed basketball team had no fans cheering for them.
meanings.sent4: The unwooed idea lingered in the back of his mind, unexplored.
meanings.sent5: The unwooed project sat on the desk, collecting dust over time.
